parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To call to myself, summon. Middle voice from pros and kaleo; to call toward oneself, i.e. Summon, invite.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Perhaps from paio; a boy, or, a girl, and a child; specially, a slave or servant.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To ask, inquire, ascertain by inquiry, understand.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
